argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscring2.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | iscring2.2 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 3 |  | iscring2.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | #P_iscrngo | |- ( R e. CRingOps <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ R e. Com2 ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_relrngo | |- Rel RingOps |
| 6 |  | #P_1st2nd | |- ( ( Rel RingOps /\ R e. RingOps ) -> R = <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mpan | |- ( R e. RingOps -> R = <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( R = <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. -> ( R e. Com2 <-> <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. e. Com2 ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_rneqi | |- ran G = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_eqtri | |- X = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_raleqi | |- ( A. x e. X A. y e. ran ( 1st ` R ) ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) <-> A. x e. ran ( 1st ` R ) A. y e. ran ( 1st ` R ) ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) ) |
| 12 | 2 | #P_oveqi | |- ( x H y ) = ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) |
| 13 | 2 | #P_oveqi | |- ( y H x ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_eqeq12i | |- ( ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) <-> ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_raleqbii | |- ( A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) <-> A. y e. ran ( 1st ` R ) ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ralbii | |- ( A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) <-> A. x e. X A. y e. ran ( 1st ` R ) ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 1st ` R ) e. _V |
| 18 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 2nd ` R ) e. _V |
| 19 |  | #P_iscom2 | |- ( ( ( 1st ` R ) e. _V /\ ( 2nd ` R ) e. _V ) -> ( <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. e. Com2 <-> A. x e. ran ( 1st ` R ) A. y e. ran ( 1st ` R ) ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) ) ) |
| 20 | 17, 18, 19 | #P_mp2an | |- ( <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. e. Com2 <-> A. x e. ran ( 1st ` R ) A. y e. ran ( 1st ` R ) ( x ( 2nd ` R ) y ) = ( y ( 2nd ` R ) x ) ) |
| 21 | 11, 16, 20 | #P_3bitr4ri | |- ( <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. e. Com2 <-> A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) ) |
| 22 | 8, 21 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( R = <. ( 1st ` R ) , ( 2nd ` R ) >. -> ( R e. Com2 <-> A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) ) ) |
| 23 | 7, 22 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( R e. Com2 <-> A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ R e. Com2 ) <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) ) ) |
| 25 | 4, 24 | #P_bitri | |- ( R e. CRingOps <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x H y ) = ( y H x ) ) ) |
